heading.name: Patient Care: Childhood Immunization
heading.definition: % of patients aged 30 to 42 months who have received all of the ministry-supplied immunizations as recommended by the National Advisory Committee on immunizations.
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from AFHTO D2D 3.0 Indicators: Data Dictionary version 4 (Nov 2015)

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT -- count patients that satisfy all 6 requirements IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.dtap > 0 AND fin.pneu > 0 AND fin.rot > 0 AND fin.menc > 0 AND fin.mmr > 0 AND fin.vz > 0 , 1, 0 ) ) , 0 )AS '% With Complete Immunizations',
-- the remainder missed one of the 6 requirements. IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, COUNT(fin.patient) - SUM( IF( fin.dtap > 0 AND fin.pneu > 0 AND fin.rot > 0 AND fin.menc > 0 AND fin.mmr > 0 AND fin.vz > 0 , 1, 0 ) ) , 0 ) AS '% Imunizations Not Complete'
FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS 'patient', IFNULL( DTaP.id, 0 ) AS 'dtap', IFNULL( PNEU.id, 0 ) AS 'pneu', IFNULL( ROT.id, 0 ) AS 'rot', IFNULL( MC.id, 0 ) AS 'menc', IFNULL( MM.id, 0 ) AS 'mmr', IFNULL( VZ.id, 0 ) AS 'vz' FROM demographic d
-- 4 instances of - DTaP-IPV-Hib - Diphtheria, Tetanus, Pertussis, Polio, Haemophilus influenzae type B LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, MAX(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${dTaPIPVHib} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(p.id) >= 4 ) DTaP ON (d.demographic_no = DTaP.demographic_no)
-- 3 instances of - Pneu-C-13 - Pneumococcal Conjugate 13 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, MAX(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${pneumococcal} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(p.id) >= 3 ) PNEU ON (d.demographic_no = PNEU.demographic_no)
-- 2 instances of - Rot-1 - Rotavirus LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, MAX(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${rotavirus} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(p.id) >= 2 ) ROT ON (d.demographic_no = ROT.demographic_no)
-- 1 instance of - Men-C-C - Meningococcal Conjugate LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${meningococcal} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) MC ON (d.demographic_no = MC.demographic_no)
-- 1 instance of - MMR - Measles, Mumps, Rubella LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${measlesMumpsRubella} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) MM ON (d.demographic_no = MM.demographic_no)
-- 1 instance of - Var - Varicella LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${varicella} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) VZ ON (d.demographic_no = VZ.demographic_no)
-- PATIENTS BETWEEN 30 TO 42 MONTHS OLD WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) / 365.25 ) BETWEEN ${lowerLimit.age} AND ${upperLimit.age} ) fin;
